channel.title: Ephomera release (317/474) - All skills, all working minigames, amazing release!
channel.description:
Hey, first off, the reason I am releasing this: Server had too much drama, and I have drumline practice to attend to(quitting rsps). It is a good server, but still needs a bit of work.
Package Download: http://uppit.com/emvzsotijhhm/Package.zip
Features: AMAZING WORK-FOR ECO, very good combat system(pretty custom) Barbarian and Gnome agility courses All skills working and trainable(I'd say around 90% complete overall) Good bossing Classic pk Nice points system All the same old same old I guess, just not Trisidia or deathly pvpz Custom whips(just lime, white, pink, elemental, and lava) Custom shields(The spirit shields) Nice classic look(317) 474 interfaces 317 map data Auto cache downloader! The ol' shitty dicing system Started monkey gri gri XDDDDDDDDD all that happends is the explosion in hand Idk what else to say, I guess this would be a shit release to some, but I loved the server. Sorry I cant do the because prntscr wont let me. I GIVE PERMISSION TO RELEASE AS LONG AS YOU GIVE ME AND SOULSPLIT MAJORITY CREDIT
Log In: http://prntscr.com/1g2jal
Agility(Never added a tele for barbarian): http://prntscr.com/1g2jp9 -Gnome http://prntscr.com/1g2jwj -Barb
Some teles(check em out yourself): http://prntscr.com/1g2k2y - Monsters http://prntscr.com/1g2kag - Minigames http://prntscr.com/1g2kdt - PVP http://prntscr.com/1g2kkr - Skilling Not even worth putting city teles lol
Eh, done posting pictures, I'm sure I didnt make this as appealing as I could of, but if you really want to see more, download it, Enjoy! This will be the first and last source I ever release
NO ANTI-LEECH FTW!!!
REMEMBER THERE IS MORE THAN ONE IP TO CHANGE! ALSO, COMPILE THE SERVER AND CLIENT BEFORE YOU RUN IT THE FIRST TIME, IF YOU ALREADY TRIED RUNNING IT, RETRY COMPLETELY AND COMPILE BEFORE ANYTHING

item.title: Ephomera release (317/474) - All skills, all working minigames, amazing release!
item.dc:creator: @du_arwi du arwi
item.description:
@du_arwi wrote:

[quote=“du arwi, post:1, topic:525300”]Hey, first off, the reason I am releasing this: Server had too much drama, and I have drumline practice to attend to(quitting rsps).
It is a good server, but still needs a bit of work.

Package Download: http://uppit.com/emvzsotijhhm/Package.zip

Features: AMAZING WORK-FOR ECO,
very good combat system(pretty custom)
Barbarian and Gnome agility courses
All skills working and trainable(I’d say around 90% complete overall)
Good bossing
Classic pk
Nice points system
All the same old same old I guess, just not Trisidia or deathly pvpz
Custom whips(just lime, white, pink, elemental, and lava)
Custom shields(The spirit shields)
Nice classic look(317)
474 interfaces
317 map data
Auto cache downloader!
The ol’ shitty dicing system
Started monkey gri gri XDDDDDDDDD all that happends is the explosion in hand
Idk what else to say, I guess this would be a shit release to some, but I loved the server.
Sorry I cant do the because prntscr wont let me.
I GIVE PERMISSION TO RELEASE AS LONG AS YOU GIVE ME AND SOULSPLIT MAJORITY CREDIT

Log In:

Lightshot

Screenshot

Captured with Lightshot

Agility(Never added a tele for barbarian):
http://prntscr.com/1g2jp9 -Gnome
http://prntscr.com/1g2jwj -Barb

Some teles(check em out yourself):
http://prntscr.com/1g2k2y - Monsters
http://prntscr.com/1g2kag - Minigames
http://prntscr.com/1g2kdt - PVP
http://prntscr.com/1g2kkr - Skilling
Not even worth putting city teles lol

Eh, done posting pictures, I’m sure I didnt make this as appealing as I could of, but if you really want to see more, download it, Enjoy! This will be the first and last source I ever release

NO ANTI-LEECH FTW!!!

REMEMBER THERE IS MORE THAN ONE IP TO CHANGE! ALSO, COMPILE THE SERVER AND CLIENT BEFORE YOU RUN IT THE FIRST TIME, IF YOU ALREADY TRIED RUNNING IT, RETRY COMPLETELY AND COMPILE BEFORE ANYTHING[/quote]
If you are wondering how to give yourself points, go to your character file and look for pcpoints then change the 0 to the amount of points you want

Read full topic
